title: ISic020604. ISic020604
body:
Facsimile Images

1ͰΟΛ[---]
1HOL[---]

Apparatus criticus

Text after Manganaro 1961

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

The document consists of two matching fragments, found accidentally during agricultural works. It was published by Cultraro (1989-1990, 451-452), who dates the piece to the second quarter of the 5th century BCE on the basis of the archaeological context.

bibliography

  • Cultraro 1989-1990 451-452 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002383
  • Manganaro 1961 110, pl. 50.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002677
  • Agostiniani 2009 115-116, no.1 fig. 2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002427
  • Mignosa 2017-2018 217, no. 3 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002428
